Serverinfo.name: MT-Server
Serverinfo.description: Enter a server name (the one you want). Enter its IP address displayed on the local network

WOLip_Local.description: IP address for local WOL (.255 to ping all Local IPs)

WOLip_Net.description: IP address for remote WOL via Internet

WOLport.description: Define WOL Target Port (9 is the standard)

remotedesk.description: Remote desktop software port. If you want to connect to the server via internet with mstcs Win app. Combined with Internet IP address ($ip2) in Internet domain

tcpport.description: TCP request control port (useful for sending a TCP Remote command to the Server)

timeout.description: Timout for Quick Connection Test in ms

boottime.description: Approximate server startup time in tenths of seconds (ex: 400 = 40sec)
